name: Rock Paper Scissors - Offline Edition
description:
RPS Offline is a simple endless runner game as an entry into Weekly Game Jam Week 154 - Theme Rock Paper Scissors.

You as the player take control of a pair of SCISSORS running through the desert. But beware! There are plenty of hazards, by means of rogue ROCKS and PAPER airplanes. Jump to avoid these perils, or your fate will be sealed! 

Leave your high score in the comments below!

-C.
